{"metadata":{"objective":"Ending with a good conclusion","lastStepAudioPath":"summary","audioPath":"CS17/6/Refresher"},"steps":[{"headerText":"","leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-cktitle\" style=\"color:#025B5B;font-family:lato,sans-serif;font-size:22px;font-weight:bold;\">Support your local movie theater!</span><br /><br />You are entering a contest to win ten free tickets to the movies!&nbsp; Your job is to write an essay explaining why you believe that going to the movies is better than staying home and watching TV.<br /><br />You have an introduction and body paragraphs from the mini-lessons on <em>Beginning with a compelling introduction</em> and <em>Building body paragraphs</em>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Now you need a strong conclusion.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <img alt=\"A diagram shows the parts of an essay:  the introduction, body paragraph 1, body paragraph 2, body paragraph 3, and the conclusion.  The conclusion is the last paragraph.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","settings":{"showHeader":0,"showAudio":1,"audioPath":"1","hideRightPanel":0,"showNext":1,"delayStep":"0","delayRight":"0"}},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"2"},"leftText":"<p>The conclusion may be the most important part of your essay.&nbsp; This is your last opportunity to convince your reader of your ideas and leave the reader with your final thought.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p>","headerText":"What belongs in the conclusion?"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"3"},"leftText":"<p>A concluding paragraph should have two parts.&nbsp; It should restate the thesis statement, and then include a final thought that will impress your reader.<br /><br /><img alt=\"\" src=\"/images/picture_it.png\" style=\"width: 27px; height: 27px;\" />&nbsp; <a href=\"S3_BUCKET_/CS17/6/Pictureit_Effectiveconclusion.pdf\" onclick=\"window.open(this.href, '', 'resizable=no,status=no,location=no,toolbar=no,menubar=no,fullscreen=no,scrollbars=yes,dependent=yes,width=800,left=100,height=600,top=50'); return false;\">Effective conclusion: Picture it!</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href=\"S3_BUCKET_/CS17/6/Screen_reader_picture_it_effective_conclusion.html\" target=\"_blank\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/images/accessible_icon.png\" style=\"width: 17px; height: 20px;\" /><span class=\"screen-reader-only\" style=\"background-color:#FA839F;\">Screen reader version of effective conclusion, opens in a new tab</span></a><br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows the two parts of a conclusion.   The first part is the restatement of your thesis statement, which can be several sentences long.   The second part is a final thought to impress your reader.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"4"},"leftText":"<p>Your conclusion should <strong>paraphrase</strong> your thesis statement.&nbsp;&nbsp;This means to use different words to restate the same ideas.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Thesis statement from the movie contest essay:</span><br /><br />Going to the movies is better than staying home because there are no distractions or interruptions at the movies; the audio and visual experiences are more intense at the movies; and making the effort&nbsp; to get out and go to a movie theater is a more active use of my time.</p>","headerText":"Restating the thesis statement"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"5"},"leftText":"<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-powertip\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\">ASK YOURSELF: Paraphrasing a thesis statement<span class=\"screen-reader-only\" style=\"background-color:#FA839F;\">&nbsp;,</span></th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><p>To use different words to restate your thesis statement, review your thesis statement and ask yourself these three questions:</p><p>1. What is the topic?</p><p>2. What are you trying to say about the topic?</p><p>3. What reasons have you included?<br /><br /><img alt=\"\" src=\"/images/picture_it.png\" style=\"width: 27px; height: 27px;\" />&nbsp; <a href=\"S3_BUCKET_/CS17/6/AskYourself_Paraphrasingathesisstatement.pdf\" onclick=\"window.open(this.href, '', 'resizable=yes,status=no,location=no,toolbar=no,menubar=no,fullscreen=no,scrollbars=no,dependent=yes,width=800,left=100,height=800,top=0'); return false;\">Ask yourself: Paraphrasing a thesis statement, Picture it!</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href=\"S3_BUCKET_/CS17/6/Screen_reader_ask_yourself_paraphrasing_a_thesis_statement.html\" target=\"_blank\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/images/accessible_icon.png\" style=\"width: 17px; height: 20px;\" /><span class=\"screen-reader-only\" style=\"background-color:#FA839F;\">Screen reader version of ask yourself: paraphrasing a thesis statement, opens in a new tab</span></a></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">What is the topic ?</span></p><p>Going to the movies<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">What am I trying to say about the topic?</span></p><p>It&#39;s better than staying at home.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">What reasons have I included?</span></p><p>No distractions or interruptions<br />Audio and visual experiences are more intense<br />More active use of my time</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"6"},"leftText":"<p>Use this information to restate the ideas, keeping the content the same, but using different words.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain ju-tight\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\"><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Thesis statement</span></th><th scope=\"col\"><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Reworded for the conclusion</span></th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Going to the movies is better than staying home because</td><td>A trip to the movies will always be better than staying home and watching TV.</td></tr><tr><td>there are no distractions or interruptions at the movies;</td><td>At the theater, you will not be interrupted by advertisements, work, or other distractions.</td></tr><tr><td>the audio and visual experiences are more intense at the movies; and</td><td>The audiovisual experience will be superior to what you can experience on your TV.</td></tr><tr><td>making the effort&nbsp; to get out and go to a movie theater is a more active use of my time.</td><td>Getting out of the house is good for your physical and mental health.</td></tr></tbody></table>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"7"},"leftText":"<p>When you put it all together into complete sentences, you can use a few sentences to reword the ideas from the thesis statement.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Thesis statement restated for the conclusion:</span></p><p>A trip to the movies will always be better than staying home and watching TV.&nbsp; While watching a film at the theater, you will not be interrupted by advertisements, work, or other distractions in your home.&nbsp; The audiovisual experience will be superior to what you can experience on your TV.&nbsp; Remember that the activity of getting out of the house is good for your physical and mental health.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"8"},"leftText":"<p>Besides restating your thesis statement, your conclusion should include a final thought that will impress your reader.&nbsp;<br /><br />Here are some ideas about what to use as your final thought.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Including a final thought"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"9"},"leftText":"<p>Make a prediction.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>The next generation may live in a world with no rainforest.</p><p>I predict that in the next ten years movie theater attendance will increase dramatically.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"10"},"leftText":"<p>Include a call to action&nbsp;in which you ask your readers to do something.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>One person can make a difference!&nbsp; Inform yourself about what you can do to save the rainforest.<br /><br />Consider making a plan to step out for a movie night several times this season.&nbsp; All those who enjoy the excitement of a night at the movies should make an effort to attend more movies this year.&nbsp; Let&#39;s get out there and support our local movie theaters!</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"11"},"leftText":"<p>Insert a personal opinion in the conclusion.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>We all love planet Earth and hope to entrust her to future generations.<br /><br />I do not know what I would do on Saturday nights if I did not have the chance to view newly-released films in the comfort of surround sound at my local theater.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"12"},"leftText":"<p>You have used reasons throughout your essay to convince the judges that your ideas are strong.&nbsp; Now is your chance to let your own voice come through.<br /><br />Choose the final thought that means the most to you.&nbsp; This will show the judges just how strongly you believe in your own ideas!<br /><br />Here is your conclusion.&nbsp; It starts with a restatement of your thesis, and ends with a call to action.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain ju-tight\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p><span style=\"color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
